Our Treatments

Comprehensive eye care services for all your retinal health needs

Specialized Eye Care Services

We offer a comprehensive range of treatments for various retinal conditions and eye health issues

Retinal Disorders

Treatment for various retinal conditions including retinal detachment, macular degeneration, and diabetic retinopathy.

  • Retinal Detachment Surgery
  • Macular Degeneration Treatment
  • Diabetic Retinopathy Management

Pediatric Eye Care

Specialized care for children and premature infants, including ROP screening and treatment.

  • ROP Screening
  • Pediatric Eye Exams
  • Vision Therapy

Myopia Management

Comprehensive myopia control and management for children and adults.

  • Orthokeratology
  • Multifocal Contact Lenses
  • Atropine Therapy

Laser Treatment

Advanced laser procedures for various retinal and eye conditions.

  • Retinal Laser Photocoagulation
  • YAG Laser Capsulotomy
  • Selective Laser Trabeculoplasty

Diagnostic Services

Comprehensive diagnostic testing using state-of-the-art equipment.

  • OCT Imaging
  • Visual Field Testing
  • Fundus Photography

Tele-consultation

Remote consultation services for follow-up visits and non-emergency cases.

  • Video Consultations
  • Remote Monitoring
  • Digital Reports

Advanced Technology

State-of-the-art equipment for accurate diagnosis and treatment

Cutting-Edge Equipment

At Sampada VR, we invest in the latest medical technology to ensure the best possible outcomes for our patients. Our advanced equipment includes:

  • Optical Coherence Tomography (OCT) for detailed retinal imaging
  • Humphrey Field Analyzer for comprehensive visual field testing
  • Advanced laser systems for precise treatment delivery
  • Digital fundus photography for accurate documentation
  • Portable diagnostic equipment for bedside examinations

Our Treatment Process

A step-by-step approach to your eye care

01

Initial Consultation

Comprehensive eye examination and medical history review

02

Diagnostic Testing

Advanced imaging and testing for accurate diagnosis

03

Treatment Planning

Personalized treatment plan based on your condition

04

Treatment & Follow-up

Treatment delivery and ongoing monitoring

Specialized Clinics

Dedicated clinics for specific conditions

ROP Clinic

Specialized care for Retinopathy of Prematurity in premature infants

  • Regular screening for premature babies
  • Early detection and intervention
  • Family education and support
  • Long-term follow-up care

Myopia Clinic

Comprehensive myopia management for children and adults

  • Myopia progression monitoring
  • Orthokeratology treatment
  • Lifestyle modification guidance
  • Regular vision assessments

Ready to Start Your Treatment?

Schedule a consultation with our specialists to discuss your eye health and treatment options.
